snippet: BNP Paribas and Credit Suisse ask authorities in the United States to go easy. | Pfizer goes online to defend its bid for AstraZeneca. | Timothy F. Geithner’s book, “Stress Test,” comes out today. | Morgan Stanley is king in Silicon Valley.
abstract: BNP Paribas and Credit Suisse ask authorities in the United States to go easy. | Pfizer goes online to defend its bid for AstraZeneca. | Timothy F. Geithner’s book, “Stress Test,” comes out today. | Morgan Stanley is king in Silicon Valley.

headline.main: BNP Paribas and Credit Suisse Seek Leniency
